timeline.bodyText: Google rule is not to abbreviate words.
timeline.author: suztomo

timeline.bodyText: Would you make this more explicit about this tool uploading the result to Google Analytics.
timeline.author: suztomo

replies.bodyText: what language do you suggest? This needs to be a short string for help, not complete documentation.
replies.author: elharo

timeline.author: suztomo

replies.bodyText: I'm too used to gnu. Fixed.
replies.author: elharo
